title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 93.4 - Limitation of risk
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 93.4 - Limitation of risk

State Regulations

Notwithstanding the provisions of section
1115
of the Insurance Law, the amount of any single aircraft risk shall be limited to not more than two percent of the life insurer's total capital and surplus as of the preceding year-end. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11
ยง
93.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
